select id as board_id , type , title , content , create_date , update_date from board where id = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: insert into board(type, title, content, create_date) values (#{type}, #{title}, #{content}, now())
mapper.update: update board set type = #{type}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_date = now() where id = #{boardId}
